title: Israelis Are Tense but Relieved That Iran’s Supreme Leader Is Dead
summary_full: Iranian missile and drone attacks have caused anxiety across Israel, but many believe it is a price worth paying for killing Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.
summary_public: Iranian missile and drone attacks have caused anxiety across Israel, but many believe it is a price worth paying for killing Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.

IL.label: mixed
IL.evidence: Iranian missile and drone attacks have caused anxiety across Israel
